editor.label: Application Server - IIS7 CreateVirtualDirectory
editor.description: Creates a virtual directory into the specified Website.

formElement.label: Application name:
formElement.documentation: The website and virtual path to contain the Virtual Directory to create, i.e: 'Default Web Site/' or 'Site1/myapp'. (Required)

formElement.label: Virtual path:
formElement.documentation: Virtual path of the virtual directory, i.e: '/myvirtualdir'. (Required)

formElement.label: Absolute physical path:
formElement.documentation: The absolute physical path of the Virtual Directory to create, i.e: 'c:/Inetpub/wwwroot/myvdir'. (Required)
